summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from 6th Avenue South on the south to Massachusetts Street; 6th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard to Holgate Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6243 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds" and declaring an emergency.
